alert.note: Alert for Burlington; Ocean (New Jersey) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly (New Jersey, Delaware, Southeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 14 at 5:59PM EDT until April 14 at 6:45PM EDT by NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly
info.description: The National Weather Service in Mount Holly NJ has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northern Ocean County in southern New Jersey... Northeastern Burlington County in southern New Jersey... * Until 645 PM EDT. * At 558 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Browns Mills, or 18 miles southeast of Trenton, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to roofs, siding, trees, and power lines is possible. * Locations impacted include... Toms River, Lakewood, Jackson, Beachwood, Manasquan, Point Pleasant Beach, Presidential Lakes Estates, Seaside Heights, Lakehurst, Wrightstown, Mantoloking, Leisure Village, Dover Beaches North, Holiday City South, Pleasant Plains, Cedar Glen West, Leisure Village East, Dover Beaches South, Georgetown and Presidential Lakes. This includes Garden State Parkway between mile markers 75 and 93. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
